articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: Unvaccinated Americans are at risk of an aggressive and more dangerous Covid-19 variant. These are the most vulnerable states - CNN
articles.description: Some states are making great strides in vaccinating their residents against Covid-19, but the ones that are not may soon be contending with a more transmissible variant, experts say.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Video: Euro 2020 - Day 9 Review - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.
